subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! CBS Suspends Imus For Two Weeks
body:
CBS says it will suspend its broadcast of Don Imus' radio program for two 
weeks following his inappropriate comment about Rutgers basketball players. 
The suspension begins next Monday.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
